q: 38th annual March for life on the National Mall in Washington on Monday, Jan. 24, 2011.( AP Photo/Alex Brandon)- Rep. Steve King Mike Pence ( R-Ind.) told pro-life activists in Washington on Monday that a nation that will not stand for life will not stand for long. The Indiana congressman-- who appears to have his eye on higher office- told the 38th annual March for Life that pro-lifers "will keep gathering until Roe v. Wade is sent to the ash heap of history

Sergio Marchionne chose the term performance award rather than profit sharing because it's difficult to talk about profit sharing when you have a negative number at the bottom line. The Chrysler news came Monday amid projections that U.S. automobile sales in January may have reached the second-fastest pace in 17 months, aided by rising business spending and consumer confidence. / Bloomberg News Fiat SpA Chief Executive Officer Sergio Marchionne confirmed the Italian carmaker's pledge to spend 20 billion euros($ 27 billion) revamping its domestic plants after meeting with Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi . Fiat is a multinational which is expanding internationally, but will keep an Italian heart, Industry Minister Paolo Romani said today after discussing the investment plan with the CEO and Chairman John Elkann . ' A promise kept' "Some in the cynical political class are saying this is a gimmick, an empty gesture," said Indiana Rep. Mike Pence , a possible Republican presidential candidate. We on the other side call it a promise kept. That refrain was repeated by Republicans often during the House debate.
